posts.content:
I am looking at a new interior on a 23 window, I have all the seat frames but will need headliner, interior and door cards, seats recovered, and carpets

Has anyone on here have any recommendations? I am trying to keep her close as possible to original (it would have been brown).

I know this can be a difficult question to answer however any help would be appreciated

Apologies to moderator if in wrong place
